response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the fridge without any errors. The next step in the plan is to open the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the kabob.
(2) Grasp the kabob.
(3) Move to the tupperware.
(4) Put the kabob in the tupperware.
(5) Move to the fridge.
(6) Open the fridge.
(7) Put the tupperware in the fridge.
(8) Close the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 6: Open the fridge
    fridge_xyejdx_0 = registry(env,"fridge_xyejdx_0")
    open(robot, fridge_xyejdx_0)
    donothing(env)
